examples: a test of both oral and written French
stories passed on by oral tradition
There will be a test of both oral and written French.
the vocal organs (= the tongue, lips, etc.)
oral sex (= using the mouth to stimulate somebody’s sex organs)
an oral contraceptive (= that is swallowed like medicine)

meanings.def: produced by allowing air to flow through the mouth but not the nose
a spoken exam, especially in a foreign language
a spoken exam in a university

(1918-2009) a US Pentecostal Minister and televangelist who broadcast regularly on radio and television. He claimed to cure people's illnesses through the power of prayer. In 1963 he established Oral Roberts University in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
